name: wash [when the waters rise] the ocean inside
blurb: Water rises and waves wash over us as we enter the gallery space filled with an ocean of suspended blue silk. Join me on my adventure!

name: Going to CEAC residency, China, during Summer 2015
blurb: During Summer 2015 I was invited to do an Art residency at CEAC in Xiamen, China and explore new aspect of my artwork.

name: The Aurora Shanty
blurb: The Aurora Shanty will bring the magic of the night sky and the marvel of the northern lights to the the 2016 Art Shanties.

name: SYNEMATIKA: The 3D Script
blurb: Transmedia artist Michael Pope creates a 3D Movie Script in the form of an immersive site-specific installation you can enter & explore

name: 1000 Glass Cranes
blurb: One artist. One year. One thousand glass cranes.

name: Island Revival
blurb: A series of immersive sounding installations that allow people to experience some of the most remote islands in Scotland.

name: Stoicheia [ELEMENTS]: Digital Stained Glass Art Installation
blurb: The art is built, we just need your help to share it! Our goal is to safely suspend, protect and ship our creation around the world!

name: Debut the installation "Nothing and Everything" in the USA
blurb: We just received an invitation to exhibit at CoCA Center on Contemporary Art in Seattle.  Need your support to deliver our exhibition.

name: Game of Thorns
blurb: Game of Thorns is an exhibition on the art and armaments of botanical warfare.

name: Instalación fotográfica para honrar a la vaquita marina.
blurb: Una reflexión para que esta historia no se repita.

name: Martin Roth: Desert Holly
blurb: In November 2017 I collected a plant from the garden of a mass shooter.

name: BLOOM: A Traveling Art Installation about OCD
blurb: A Large-Scale Art Installation & Traveling Exhibition about Living with Obsessive Compulsive Disorder.

name: For our Tomorrow
blurb: An interactive Art campaign across London to help us celebrate the sacrifices made by those around us and those that have been to war.

name: DEAR FRONTLINE Honoring Essential Workers with Public Art
blurb: Illuminate the courageous service of essential workers during the COVID crisis, and put artists to work, with large-scale art.

name: Spookadelia 3: Back to the Source
blurb: Spookadelia 3: Back to the Source is a psychedelic immersive art and theatrical experience presented by Spectra Art Space.

name: Immersive Art Space
blurb: An Immersive art space designed to facilitate social interaction

name: Big Maps for a Small Planet - solo show by A.V. Rankin
blurb: Big Maps for a Small Planet - solo exhibition by A.V.Rankin at Cherry Street Pier

name: Over Ruled - Burning Man 2023
blurb: Looking Up Arts will be creating another interactive art installation for Burning Man this year: "Over Ruled"

name: Lucid Dream: An Immersive Experience
blurb: My very first full scale immersive and meditative experience in London.

name: APEX Photography Exhibition
blurb: I need your help to make an exhibition happen for my Final Major Project, Apex.

name: Sirsasana (Headstand) - Burning Man 2022
blurb: A 30 foot tall playful tree-like sculpture doing a headstand, inviting everyone to interact with its environment.

name: Moonlight Outpost: A Burning Man Wonton Soup Cart
blurb: A Hong Kong inspired wonton noodle soup cart serving after-hours in Deep Playa to soothe the souls of wandering travelers.
